verses.verse: Then all <WH3605> the congregation <WH5712> lifted <WH5375> up their voices <WH6963> and cried, <WH5414> and the people <WH5971> wept <WH1058> that night. <WH3915>

And all <WH3605> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> grumbled <WH9235> against <WH5921> Moses <WH4872> and Aaron; <WH175> and the whole <WH3605> congregation <WH5712> said <WH559> to them, "Would <WH3863> that we had died <WH4191> in the land <WH776> of Egypt! <WH4714> Or <WH176> would <WH3863> that we had died <WH4191> in this <WH2088> wilderness! <WH4057>

"And why <WH4100> is the Lord <WH3068> bringing <WH935> us into this <WH2088> land, <WH776> to fall <WH5307> by the sword <WH2719>? Our wives <WH802> and our little <WH2945> ones <WH2945> will become <WH1961> plunder; <WH957> would it not be better <WH2896> for us to return <WH7725> to Egypt <WH4714>?"
So they said <WH559> to one <WH376> another, <WH251> "Let us appoint <WH5414> a leader <WH7218> and return <WH7725> to Egypt. <WH4714>"

Then Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> fell <WH5307> on their faces <WH6440> in the presence <WH6440> of all <WH3605> the assembly <WH6951> of the congregation <WH5712> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

And Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126> and Caleb <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Jephunneh, <WH3312> of those who had spied <WH8446> out the land, <WH776> tore <WH7167> their clothes; <WH899>

and they spoke <WH559> to all <WH3605> the congregation <WH5712> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> "The land <WH776> which <WH834> we passed <WH5674> through <WH5674> to spy <WH8446> out is an exceedingly <WH3966> good <WH2896> land. <WH776>

"If <WH518> the Lord <WH3068> is pleased <WH2654> with us, then He will bring <WH935> us into this <WH2088> land, <WH776> and give <WH5414> it to us – a land <WH776> which <WH834> flows <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey. <WH1706>

"Only <WH389> do not rebel <WH4775> against the Lord; <WH3068> and do not fear <WH3372> the people <WH5971> of the land, <WH776> for they shall be our prey. <WH3899> Their protection <WH6738> has been removed <WH5493> from them, and the Lord <WH3068> is with us; do not fear <WH3372> them."

But all <WH3605> the congregation <WH5712> said <WH559> to stone <WH7275> them with stones. <WH68> Then the glory <WH9202> of the Lord <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> in the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150> to all <WH3605> the sons <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

And the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> "How <WH575> long <WH5704> will this <WH2088> people <WH5971> spurn <WH5006> Me? And how <WH575> long <WH5704> will they not believe <WH539> in Me, despite all <WH3605> the signs <WH226> which <WH834> I have performed <WH6213> in their midst <WH7130>?
"I will smite <WH5221> them with pestilence <WH1698> and dispossess <WH3423> them, and I will make <WH6213> you into a nation <WH1471> greater <WH1419> and mightier <WH6099> than <WH4480> they."

But Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> to the Lord, <WH3068> "Then the Egyptians <WH4714> will hear <WH8085> of it, for by Thy strength <WH3581> Thou didst bring <WH5927> up this <WH2088> people <WH5971> from their midst, <WH7130>

and they will tell <WH559> [it] to the inhabitants <WH3427> of this <WH2088> land. <WH776> They have heard <WH8085> that Thou, O Lord, <WH3068> art in the midst <WH7130> of this <WH2088> people, <WH5971> for Thou, O Lord, <WH3068> art seen <WH7200> eye <WH5869> to eye, <WH5869> while Thy cloud <WH6051> stands <WH5975> over <WH5921> them; and Thou dost go <WH1980> before <WH6440> them in a pillar <WH5982> of cloud <WH6051> by day <WH3119> and in a pillar <WH5982> of fire <WH784> by night. <WH3915>
"Now if Thou dost slay <WH5221> this <WH2088> people <WH5971> as one <WH259> man, <WH376> then the nations <WH1471> who <WH834> have heard <WH8085> of Thy fame <WH8088> will say, <WH559>

'Because <WH4480> the Lord <WH3068> could <WH3201> not bring <WH935> this <WH2088> people <WH5971> into the land <WH776> which <WH834> He promised <WH7650> them by oath, <WH7650> therefore He slaughtered <WH7819> them in the wilderness. <WH4057>'
"But now, <WH6258> I pray, <WH4994> let the power <WH3581> of the Lord <WH136> be great, <WH1431> just <WH9201> as Thou hast declared, <WH1696> <WH559>

'The Lord <WH3068> is slow <WH750> to anger <WH639> and abundant <WH7227> in lovingkindness, <WH2617> forgiving <WH5375> iniquity <WH5771> and transgression; <WH6588> but He will by no <WH3808> means <WH5352> clear <WH5352> [the guilty,] visiting <WH6485> the iniquity <WH5771> of the fathers on the children <WH1> to the third <WH1121> and the fourth <WH8029> [generations.]'

"Pardon, <WH5545> I pray, <WH4994> the iniquity <WH5771> of this <WH2088> people <WH5971> according to the greatness <WH1433> of Thy lovingkindness, <WH2617> just <WH9201> as Thou also hast forgiven <WH5375> this <WH2088> people, <WH5971> from Egypt <WH4714> even until <WH5704> now. <WH2008>"
So the Lord <WH3068> said, <WH559> "I have pardoned <WH5545> [them] according to your word; <WH1697>
but indeed, <WH199> as I live, <WH2416> all <WH3605> the earth <WH776> will be filled <WH4390> with the glory <WH9202> of the Lord. <WH3068>

"Surely <WH3588> all <WH3605> the men <WH376> who have seen <WH7200> My glory <WH9202> and My signs, <WH226> which <WH834> I performed <WH6213> in Egypt <WH4714> and in the wilderness, <WH4057> yet have put <WH5254> Me to the test <WH5254> these <WH2088> ten <WH6235> times <WH6471> and have not listened <WH8085> to My voice, <WH6963>
shall by no <WH518> means <WH518> see <WH7200> the land <WH776> which <WH834> I swore <WH7650> to their fathers, nor <WH1> shall any <WH3808> of those who spurned <WH3605> Me see <WH5006> it.

"But My servant <WH5650> Caleb, <WH3612> because <WH6118> he has <WH5973> had <WH1961> a different <WH312> spirit <WH7307> and has followed <WH310> Me fully, <WH4390> I will bring <WH935> into the land <WH776> which <WH834> he entered, <WH935> and his descendants <WH2233> shall take <WH3423> possession <WH3423> of it.

"Now the Amalekites <WH6003> and the Canaanites <WH3669> live <WH3427> in the valleys; <WH6010> turn <WH6437> tomorrow <WH4279> and set <WH5265> out to the wilderness <WH4057> by the way <WH1870> of the Red <WH5488> <WH3220> Sea. <WH3220>"
And the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses <WH4872> and Aaron, <WH175> saying, <WH559>

"How <WH4970> long <WH5704> <WH4970> [shall I bear] with this <WH2088> evil <WH7451> congregation <WH5712> who <WH834> are grumbling <WH9235> against <WH5921> Me? I have heard <WH8085> the complaints <WH8519> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> which <WH834> they are making <WH9235> against <WH5921> Me.
"Say <WH559> to them, 'As I live, <WH2416>' says <WH5002> the Lord, <WH3068> 'just <WH9201> as you have spoken <WH1696> in My hearing, <WH241> so <WH3651> I will surely do <WH6213> to you;

your corpses <WH6297> shall fall <WH5307> in this <WH2088> wilderness, <WH4057> even all <WH3605> your numbered <WH6485> men, according to your complete <WH3605> number <WH4557> from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward, <WH4605> who <WH834> have grumbled <WH9235> against <WH5921> Me.

'Surely <WH518> you shall not come <WH935> into the land <WH776> in which <WH834> I swore <WH5375> <WH3027> to settle <WH7931> you, except <WH3588> <WH518> Caleb <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Jephunneh <WH3312> and Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun. <WH5126>

'Your children, <WH2945> however, whom <WH834> you said <WH559> would become <WH1961> a prey <WH957> – I will bring <WH935> them in, and they shall know <WH3045> the land <WH776> which <WH834> you have rejected. <WH3988>
'But as for you, your corpses <WH6297> shall fall <WH5307> in this <WH2088> wilderness. <WH4057>

'And your sons <WH1121> shall be shepherds <WH7462> for forty <WH705> years <WH8141> in the wilderness, <WH4057> and they shall suffer <WH5375> [for] your unfaithfulness, <WH2184> until <WH5704> your corpses <WH6297> lie <WH8552> in the wilderness. <WH4057>

'According to the number <WH4557> of days <WH3117> which <WH834> you spied <WH8446> out the land, <WH776> forty <WH705> days, <WH3117> for every <WH3117> day <WH3117> you shall bear <WH5375> your guilt <WH5771> a year, <WH8141> [even] forty <WH705> years, <WH8141> and you shall know <WH3045> My opposition. <WH8569>

'I, the Lord, <WH3068> have spoken, <WH1696> surely <WH518> <WH3808> this <WH2088> I will do <WH6213> to all <WH3605> this <WH2088> evil <WH7451> congregation <WH5712> who are gathered <WH3259> together against <WH5921> Me. In this <WH2088> wilderness <WH4057> they shall be destroyed, <WH8552> and there <WH8033> they shall die. <WH4191>' "

As for the men <WH376> whom <WH834> Moses <WH4872> sent <WH7971> to spy <WH8446> out the land <WH776> and who returned <WH7725> and made all <WH3605> the congregation <WH5712> grumble <WH9235> against <WH5921> him by bringing <WH3318> out a bad <WH1681> report <WH1681> concerning <WH5921> the land, <WH776>
even those men <WH376> who brought <WH3318> out the very bad <WH1681> <WH7451> report <WH1681> of the land <WH776> died <WH4191> by a plague <WH4046> before <WH6440> the Lord. <WH3068>

But Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126> and Caleb <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Jephunneh <WH3312> remained <WH2421> alive <WH2421> out of those <WH1992> men <WH376> who went <WH1980> to spy <WH8446> out the land. <WH776>
And when Moses <WH4872> spoke <WH1696> these <WH428> words <WH1697> to all <WH3605> the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> the people <WH5971> mourned <WH56> greatly. <WH3966>

In the morning, <WH1242> however, they rose <WH7925> up early <WH7925> and went <WH5927> up to the ridge <WH7218> of the hill <WH2022> country, <WH2022> saying, <WH559> "Here <WH2009> we are; we have indeed <WH3588> sinned, <WH2398> but we will go <WH5927> up to the place <WH4725> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> has promised. <WH559>"
But Moses <WH4872> said, <WH559> "Why <WH4100> then <WH2088> are you transgressing <WH5674> the commandment <WH6310> of the Lord, <WH3068> when it will not succeed <WH6743>?
"Do not go <WH5927> up, lest <WH3808> you be struck <WH5062> down <WH5062> before <WH6440> your enemies, <WH340> for the Lord <WH3068> is not among <WH7130> you.

"For the Amalekites <WH6003> and the Canaanites <WH3669> will be there <WH8033> in front <WH6440> of you, and you will fall <WH5307> by the sword, <WH2719> inasmuch <WH3588> <WH5921> <WH3651> as you have turned <WH7725> back <WH7725> from following <WH310> the Lord. <WH3068> And the Lord <WH3068> will not be with you."

But they went <WH5927> up heedlessly <WH9424> to the ridge <WH7218> of the hill <WH2022> country; <WH2022> neither <WH3808> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the Lord <WH3068> nor <WH3808> Moses <WH4872> left <WH4185> the camp. <WH4264>

Then the Amalekites <WH6003> and the Canaanites <WH3669> who lived <WH3427> in that hill <WH2022> country <WH2022> came <WH3381> down, <WH3381> and struck <WH5221> them and beat <WH3807> them down <WH3807> as far <WH5704> as Hormah. <WH2767>
